Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=25 µM), Klebsiella pneumoniae KK3 9904 (MIC=100 µM), Enterobacter cloacae HNTCC 53001 (MIC=50 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC=100 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus epidermidis RP62A (MIC=100 µM), Streptococcus Group B HNTCC 80130 (MIC=50 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Pentadactylin an antimicrobial peptide from the skin secretions of the South American bullfrog Leptodactylus pentadactylus.
Literature.Reference: Comp Biochem Physiol C Toxicol Pharmacol. 2005 Aug;141(4)393-397.
Literature.Author: King JD, Al-Ghaferi N, Abraham B, Sonnevend A, Leprince J, Nielsen PF, Conlon JM.
